article_title: New York Times CIO Marc Frons to Leave in June
article_text: Security and regulatory concerns have limited health care providers’ use of offshore IT services, but pressure to reduce costs is prompting them to find ways to leverage the offshore model while safeguarding sensitive data.

twitter.description: Mr. Frons joined the Times in 2006, building the technology team from 40 people to more than 300, a memo to staff said. Initiatives undertaken during his tenure include digital subscription products and a digital content management system.
twitter.title: New York Times CIO Marc Frons to Leave in June
